forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. ESE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 51F. ESE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 36F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers and scattered thunderstorms. High 59F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 54F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
